Title: Down by Law
Actors: Tom Waits, John Lurie, Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi
Plot: DJ Zack and pimp Jack end up in prison for being too laid-back to avoid being framed for crimes they didn't commit. They end up sharing a cell with eccentric Italian optimist Roberto, whose limited command of the English language is both entertaining and infuriating. More useful to them is the fact that Roberto knows an escape route.
